EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - India
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/india> If you are interested in developing, deploying, and scaling applications for the Cloud Generation then join the Pivotal engineering team for a hands-on workshop with Pivotal Cloud Foundry while you network with peers and build some new skills.
Who Should Attend?
This workshop is geared to application developers, enterprise architects, and anyone who wants to get hands-on experience developing an app in a PaaS environment. Java Developers and Spring users will find this workshop of great value. See the lab modules and topics we'll cover.
